item.description:
The difference between healthy people vs. an unhealthy people is education and information. Come to this meetup to learn you can be a healthier and a stronger you by:

• Preventing Disease
• Managing and/or eradicating existing diseases
• Giving you more energy
• Just living a healthier and longer lifestyle

Come see what’s bad for and What Good for you. If have or know anyone that suffers from and learn how 100 million Americans are affected by Diabetes. 

We teach you how little changes in your eating habits can enhance your health and longevity as well as your families.

Just remember this phrase:
“It's Not JUSt What You Eat That Kills You; It's What You Don't Eat!”

FDI Training Center, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH
When: Wed, May 2, 2012, 7pm - 9pm
Bring: Pen, notebook, a willingness to learn

Simple enough? There are no parking fees to worry about, we have a big parking lot. Be sure to jot down my cell, if you get lost or need it or just have questions. Bernadette - 603-834-4587.

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Health Seminar - 90 for Life and Diabetes
